name: Desktop Clout!
description:
A resource management game where you have to keep track of several elements, and balance your attention between actions- all set in your own desktop! Don't run out of space and generate as much clout as possible to meet the quotas, or your ass is forfeit.

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42 as a compo entry, around the theme "running out of space." The more I worked on the game, the farther it seemed to drift from the theme, but I'm all about goin with the flow.

Each run gives you a little more insight on the systems in the game, so try a couple and see how far you can get!
